title: Hero: Card
code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
    <gds-card
      variant="primary"
      border-color="primary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Primary
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card
      variant="secondary"
      border-color="secondary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Secondary
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card
      variant="tertiary"
      border-color="tertiary"
      width="100px"
      height="80px"
      justify-content="flex-end"
      padding="s"
    >
      Tertiary
    </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
